name: Recycling Champion
description: Where do batteries go? Where do plastic bottles go? Test out your recycling abilities with recycling champion. Choose a bin that you will sort the trash into, and move the bin left and right using the A key and D key, to sort the trash into the bins. Put the recycling in the recycling, compost in the compost, and trash in the trash can. Don’t get it wrong or else Earth will be full of trash!
